channel.title: IT on Sangeeta Menon
channel.description: Recent content in IT on Sangeeta Menon

item.title: Imapct of COVID-19 on the IT Industry
item.description: Corona. Covid-19. The very word invokes fear in the mind and prayer on the lips. When the first case was detected in China no one had an inkling about its global consequences. In fact, the news was probably taken with a pinch of salt. It is when the cases spiked across the globe that the entire situation spiralled out of control. Given the lethality of the virus, the fear was palpable.
